name: Costillas con Papas y Pi√±a
description: Traditional Canarian dish of boiled pork ribs, potatoes, and corn on the cob.

ingredients: 600 g pork ribs (membrane removed. Weight includes bone)
2 cob of corn (can be sweet corn, around 200 g each)

instructions: - Leave the ribs soaking overnight in water with a pinch of salt.
- Boil the ribs for 45 minutes in a covered pot with another pinch of salt.
- Add the potatoes (peeled and halved) and the corn cobs (splitted), season with a pinch more salt.

culinary: Removing the rib membrane helps the ribs cook more evenly.
Corn sweetness balances the salty broth typical of this dish.
serving: Serve generously with mojo verde and/or mojo rojo.
